data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 612,249 who are far from you in Vladimir, Russia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vladimir, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 21,128 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Vladimir.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Vladimir, Russia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Yukagir people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Yukagir people.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Vladimir, Russia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Vladimir.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vladimir, Russia has a population of 1,443,700.

We estimate Vladimir has 21,128 people who might know Jesus, 810,323 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 612,249 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 21,128 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Vladimir.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
